column4: theadmin so i checked my config, its setup properly to accept an ip via dhcp from the router, i even tried checking the box saying that it must use ipv4, and also tried removing the saved configuration and starting fresh. no go. still only gives me an ipv6 address, no v4
i'm not sure what to try
im thinking of disabling v6 from the router
no real need for it.. right ?
i agree with theadmin , its not your pcs fault...
